akn:section.akn:heading: Commissioner for Interama; procurement and appointment of personnel; powers and duties

akn:content.akn:p: (a) There shall be in the designated department or agency a Commissioner for Interama who shall be appointed by the President. Subject to the direction of the head of the designated department or agency, the Commissioner for Interama shall perform such duties as the President may prescribe to carry out this chapter.
